00011 std::string modules::options::GetOption(const std::string& key)const{
00012     OptionsList_t::const_iterator it = fOptions.find(key);
00013     std::string value= it!=fOptions.end()? it->second : "";
00014     return value;
00015 }

00017 T modules::options::GetOption(const std::string& key,const T& defVal)const{
00018     std::stringstream ss(GetOption(key));
00019     T val=defVal;
00020     ss>>val;
00021     return val;

00032 std::string modules::options::GetString(const std::string& name,const std::string& defVal)const{

00034         modules::parser::TrimWhiteSpaceBeforeAfter(ret_val);
00035         if(ret_val=="") ret_val=defVal;

00043 int modules::options::GetVectorStringsByWhiteSpace(const std::string& name, std::vector<std::string>& vect)const{
00044     std::stringstream ss(GetOption(name));
00045     std::string val;
00046     int num_tokens=0;
00047     for(;ss>>val; num_tokens++) {
00048       vect.push_back(val);
00049     }
00050     return num_tokens;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int modules::options::GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(const std::string& name, std::vector<std::string>& vect, const char* delim)const{
00054     char line[2048];
00055     strcpy(line,GetOption(name).c_str());
00056     char* word = strtok(line,delim);
00057     int num_tokens=0;
00058     for(;word != NULL; num_tokens++) {
00059             //std::cout<<"ModulesOptions:GetVectorStringsByDelimiter() "<<word<<std::endl;
00060         vect.push_back(word);
00061         word = strtok(NULL,delim);
00062     }
00063     return num_tokens;
00064 }

00066 void modules::options::DumpOptions(const std::string& prefix)const{
00067     //std::cout<<"key  "<<" = "<<" value "<<std::endl;
00068     OptionsOrder_t::const_iterator it;
00069     for(it=fOrder.begin();it!=fOrder.end();it++){
00070         std::cout<<prefix<<(*it)->first;
00071         if((*it)->second!=""){
00072            std::cout<<" = "<<(*it)->second;
00073         }
00074         std::cout<<std::endl;
00075     }
00076 }

00078 void modules::options::AddArgument(const int& number, const std::string& option){
00079     // Get the name of this argument
00080     std::string name = modules::factory::Instance()->GetArgumentName(fModuleName,number);
00081     // Set the value of the corresponding option

00085 bool modules::options::AppendToOption(const std::string& name, const std::string& option){
00086     // Get the option 
00087     OptionsList_t::iterator it= fOptions.find(name);
00088 
00089     // If no option exists return false
00090     if(it==fOptions.end()) return false;
00091 
00092     // Add the value to it
00093     it->second+=" : "+option;
00094     return true;
00095 }
